fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Infuse (Night): Grant a target Basic defense, roleblock immunity, and control immunity for that night.
-Complete Infusion (Night): Grant the effects of Infuse to the entire Unseen for that night. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Control and roleblock immune. You are able to protect from indirect and astral attacks.
